item.title: Psychosis: Psychotherapy vs. Control
item.description: .loader-spinner { width: 20px; height: 20px; margin-bottom: -5px; border: 2px solid rgb(133, 133, 133); border-bottom-color: transparent; border-radius: 50%; display: inline-block; box-sizing: border-box; animation: rotation 1s linear infinite;} @keyframes rotation {0% {transform: rotate(0deg);} 100% {transform: rotate(360deg);}} var randID=makeid(10);async function renderAuthors(){for(;!isDataSaved();)await new Promise(t=setTimeout(t,1e3));var t=JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("apiResponse")),e=!0;for(let r=0;rt.text()).then(t={t=JSON.parse(t),text="";for(let e=0;e, ';text=text.slice(0,-2);for(let r=0;r General Description The data-psychosis-psyctr dataset is a meta-analytic research domain MARD which is part of the Metapsy project. The dataset contains study information and effect size data of randomized trials on psychological interventions for schizophrenia and psychosis.
